mainHero.title: Juvele
mainHero.subtitle: Carbon Gaming.
mainHero.description: Material innovation in the gaming mouse industry has stagnated. At Juvele we aim to change that! Our mouse utilizes carbon fiber to allow for ultra-light gaming while avoiding the use of perforations. With other products on the way, let's reinvent gaming products from their fundamentals!

items.title: An engineering challenge
items.description: We started from scratch! We took our favorite design features from leading gaming mice, such as low weight, small shape, and symmetrical design. While stuffing this into our first mouse was not easy, with over 50+ 3D printed prototypes and many long nights, the design is complete and the internals fit! So we move on to our next challenge, the carbon layups!!

items.title: Unique compact design!
items.description: The most critical aspect when developing the mouse was size and shape. Our mouse measures in at 117x61x37 mm, making it small! The design is unique with a strong extrusion on the side to provide grip for a claw-style grip and a smooth hump for improved palm grip. We hope you will enjoy the shape as much as we do!

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: What our product aims to deliver!
features.description: As two-engineering students we aim to deliver an experience that will rival leading brands. Is that possible? maybe not :( but we can definitely try our best!

items.name: Weight
items.description: Low weight is a driving factor for building a mouse out of carbon fiber due to its material properties. We aim to reduce mouse fatigue-related injuries. We don't have an exact number for the carbon fiber C3D but we will soon!

items.name: Size
items.description: Small size is essential for many gamers who want to push their aim to the limit! While for normal day-to-day usage the mouse is designed to be used by all hand sizes!

items.name: Comfort
items.description: Comfort is important to allow for long-term usage. No mouse is perfect but with our design, we want to reduce potential health-related side effects from poorly designed office mice!

items.name: Repairability
items.description: Let's do our part! Our mice are assembled by hand, we plan on providing parts and manuals on how to repair the mouse! Our goal is to reduce wasted plastic, with out Plastic C3D we want YOU to reuse your mouse...

items.name: Carbon Fiber C3D
features: Single Piece Carbon Fiber Top Shell
